Install fire-resistant materials: Use fire-resistant materials for building and roofing materials, and install fire-resistant shutters and windows to reduce the risk of fire spreading.
Keep a fire extinguisher: Have a fire extinguisher readily available and know how to use it properly.
Maintain a fire escape ladder: Keep a fire escape ladder in good condition and make sure it is easily accessible.
Create a fire alarm system: Install a smoke detector and carbon monoxide detector, and have a fire alarm system in place to alert you in case of a fire.
Use fire-resistant plants: Plant fire-resistant trees and shrubs around your home to help prevent the spread of fires.
